typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		Name as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	format: 'parquet') ~> LecturaADL
source(output(
		FSK as integer,
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		Name as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp,
		ROWHASH as string,
		FECHACREACION as timestamp,
		FECHAACTUALIZACION as timestamp,
		ACTUALIZACIONESAPLICADAS as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> LecturaDW
LecturaADL derive(ROWHASH = sha1(512,ProductCategoryID,Name,rowguid,ModifiedDate)) ~> CalcularRowHash
CalcularRowHash, SelectLlave exists(LecturaADL@ProductCategoryID == SelectLlave@ProductCategoryID,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Nuevo
LecturaDW select(mapColumn(
		ROWHASH
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectRowHash
LecturaDW select(mapColumn(
		ProductCategoryID,
		FECHACREACION,
		FECHAACTUALIZACION,
		ACTUALIZACIONESAPLICADAS
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> SelectLlave
CalcularRowHash, SelectLlave exists(LecturaADL@ProductCategoryID == SelectLlave@ProductCategoryID,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Existente
IdentificarCambios alterRow(updateIf(isNull(CalcularRowHash@ROWHASH!=SelectRowHash@ROWHASH))) ~> MarcarCambios
Existente, SelectRowHash lookup(CalcularRowHash@ROWHASH == SelectRowHash@ROWHASH,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> IdentificarCambios
Nuevo sink(input(
		FSK as integer,
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		Name as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp,
		ROWHASH as string,
		FECHACREACION as timestamp,
		FECHAACTUALIZACION as timestamp,
		ACTUALIZACIONESAPLICADAS as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		ProductCategoryID = LecturaADL@ProductCategoryID,
		Name,
		rowguid,
		ModifiedDate,
		ROWHASH
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CargarRegistros
MarcarCambios sink(input(
		FSK as integer,
		ProductCategoryID as integer,
		Name as string,
		rowguid as string,
		ModifiedDate as timestamp,
		ROWHASH as string,
		FECHACREACION as timestamp,
		FECHAACTUALIZACION as timestamp,
		ACTUALIZACIONESAPLICADAS as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['ProductCategoryID'],
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		ProductCategoryID,
		Name,
		rowguid,
		ModifiedDate,
		ROWHASH = CalcularRowHash@ROWHASH
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
